title: Long live the creator of fascism (Italian poster, 1937)
Text:: Long live the creator of fascism.Year  1937.Publisher  NA.Artist  NA.Additional information  This poster featuring Mussolini was displayed during his state visit to Libya in 1937, then an Italian colony. The visit included various events such as rallies, the inauguration of a new highway, and a ceremony where Mussolini was proclaimed the ‘Protector of Islam’. Additionally, there was a ceremony where Mussolini was presented with the ‘Sword of Islam’. The image below shows the same placard along with one featuring Italian King Victor Emmanuel III.
